payload.name: prototype-similarity-based
payload.core: Categorize by similarity to prototypes or exemplars rather than strict necessary-and-sufficient definitions, producing graded membership judgments.
proc: identify prototypes or exemplars for target categories
compute similarity between item and prototypes
assign graded membership based on similarity scores
handle boundary cases via typicality gradients

diff.vs_fuzzy_logic: focuses on similarity geometry to prototypes; fuzzy uses degree membership without exemplars
diff.vs_case_based: classifies by similarity; case-based uses exemplars for problem-solving and adaptation

fail.desc: hidden bias in prototypes propagates to all classifications; category drift over time

rel.name: analogical
rel.link: similarity for inference, not just classification

ex.scenario: categorizing support tickets by similarity to prototype ticket types
ex.approach: compute similarity to exemplar tickets for each category, assign graded membership, route based on highest typicality score
